Posts.Content: Feb 18, 2016 08:25AM CoolgrammieNC wrote: Hello Everybody, I'm am 10 days post surgery. My surgery was 13 hrs.lon, I didn't wake up until next day....crazy...the first week was awful only because my body would not accept any type of pain meds, stayed in hospital 6 days....been off all pain meds 8 days post op. And feeling 100% better....a little rough, but all behind meüôèüèºgot my path reports, Dr. Said there was a lot more that never showed up on any of my scans, they were very surprised, but they got it all, margins clean, and no need for chemo or radiation, maybe just tamaxfin, find that out in couple weeks.GOD was with me along with all you wonderful women's prayers and thoughts, thank you....now my job is to rest and heal, I'm a happy camper....
Posts.Title: January 2016 Surgeries SVGsurvive Jr114
